thread.title: 1st Time New Yorkers
thread.title_full: 1st Time New Yorkers - Review of Radisson Martinique on Broadway, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kelly F
title: 1st Time New Yorkers
text: I surprised my husband with a trip to NYC to see Eric Clapton. I wanted a hotel near Madison Squre Garden and after reading reviews decided on Radisson Martinique. The hotel was excellent, the staff was pleasant and extremely attentive. Parking was available directly across the street for a reasonable rate. The breakfast buffet was excellent!
